com.jcatalog.grailsflow.engine.helper
[Groovy] Class ActionsCodeParser

java.lang.Object
  com.jcatalog.grailsflow.engine.helper.ActionsCodeParser

class ActionsCodeParser

Class that parses Process source to get code of action section for each node DO NOT USE this class out of Grailsflow core since it's implementation will likely change

Authors:
Maria Voitovich
